gr.forth.ics.swkm.model2.views
Interface Inheritable

All Superinterfaces:
RdfNode, View
All Known Subinterfaces:
ClassView, MetaclassView, MetapropertyView, PropertyView
public interface Inheritable
extends View

The supertype of all schema-related views.

All methods of this type throw IllegalStateException if the type of this node (i.e. type()) is no longer a class or a property or a metaclass or a metaproperty.

Author:
Andreou Dimitris, email: jim.andreou (at) gmail (dot) com

ancestors

Iterable<? extends Inheritable> ancestors(Transitively transitively)
Returns the (direct or transitive) ancestors of this class. Direct ancestors are requested with Transitively#NO while transitive ones with Transitively#YES.

Parameters:
transitively - whether to return non-direct (i.e. transitive) ancestors too
Returns:
the direct or transitive ancestors of this node

leastCommonAncestorWith

Inheritable leastCommonAncestorWith(RdfNode node)
Returns the least (in the hierarchy) that this node and the specified one have as a common ancestor.

Parameters:
node - the node, combined with this one, to find the least common ancestor of
Returns:
the least common ancestor of this node and the specified one
